upload-success-body: You have successfully uploaded a file to a bucket :)
getone-success-body: You have successfully retrieved data of a file :)
invalid-input-body: The input is invalid, please try again.
invalid-input-metadata-body: The given metadata are not a valid json.
signature-failed-body: The request is not allowed or something else went wrong.
something-went-wrong-body: Something went wrong, please try again later
rename-success-body: You have successfully renamed a file :)
delete-success-body: You have successfully deleted a file in the bucket.
delete-text: Are you sure you want to delete the file "{{name}}"?
delete-all-text: Are you sure you want to delete the whole prefix "{{name}}"?
remove-all-files: Remove all files in this prefix
ask-upload: Are you sure you want to upload this file?
bucket-quota-body: The application's storage space is insufficient. Please contact the service staff for this application.
